overview: With more than 3000 years of history, Jerusalem is mentioned 800 times in the Bible, and prophesied to play a key role in world destiny. Many of these prophecies have already come to pass, with some yet to be fulfilled. This video shows how the current peace process is fraught with peril, why it is impossible for Jerusalem to know true peace in our age, and the Palestinian myth.
title: Israel, Islam, and Armageddon
